name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.balancer.max-no-move-interval
description:
If this specified amount of time has elapsed and no block has been moved
    out of a source DataNode, on more effort will be made to move blocks out of
    this DataNode in the current Balancer iteration.

name: mapreduce.job.encrypted-intermediate-data.buffer.kb
description:
Buffer size for intermediate encrypt data in kb
  default is 128

name: dfs.blockreport.initialDelay
description:
Delay for first block report in seconds. Support multiple time unit
    suffix(case insensitive), as described in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If
    no time unit is specified then seconds is assumed

name: dfs.datanode.lock-reporting-threshold-ms
description:
When thread waits to obtain a lock, or a thread holds a lock for
    more than the threshold, a log message will be written. Note that
    dfs.lock.suppress.warning.interval ensures a single log message is
    emitted per interval for waiting threads and a single message for holding
    threads to avoid excessive logging.

name: mapreduce.job.encrypted-intermediate-data-key-size-bits
description: Mapreduce encrypt data key size default is 128

name: dfs.balancer.getBlocks.min-block-size
description:
Minimum block threshold size in bytes to ignore when fetching a source's
    block list.

name: dfs.namenode.lease-hard-limit-sec
description: Determines the namenode automatic lease recovery interval in seconds.
